businessProfile.name: Uncle Spike's Pizzeria
businessProfile.address: 242 E Garfield Rd, Aurora, OH 44202, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 242 E Garfield Rd, Aurora, OH 44202, USA

reviews.text: Fantastic pizza & true love of business & pride of product comes from the owner of this pizza shop. He shared with me a little more about his business & his taste for great food. The sauce is delicious & we will be sure to ask for a little extra on our next pizza order because we loved it so. The sub & brownie were tasty as well. Next time, a specialty pizza is up for order.

I love this place. The New Yorker is HUGE and it‚Äôs always so good. Last week I went to pick up my pizza and because it was so big I went to put it through my door sideways into the car and the pizza fell out of the box on the ground. The guy at the register immediately told them to make me a new one and helped me clean it up. When I went to pay for the new pizza they said ‚Äúno worries‚Ä¶ accidents happen, enjoy your pizza‚Äù and didn‚Äôt let me pay for the new one. Super nice people and definitely did make my night!

So glad to have discovered this place! Mind you, I discovered it through installing the epoxy floors there, because I actually live an hour away. But I stopped there today and finally had a chance to try out his pizza..

And let me tell you! Some of the best pizza I've ever had! I got the New Yorker, and I've legitimately never seen a bigger pizza, not in person at least.

I've gotten to know the owner, and he seems to really care about his business, and clearly cares about his pizza, because it for sure shows in the quality of it! All of the ingredients tasted super fresh, and super tasty.

I got the New Yorker with Pepperoni and Banana Peppers, my personal favorite combination. And I only made it through 2 slices!! 2!!

This pizza is worth every dime. It was not only tasty, but cooked to perfection. The toppings were plentiful, the dough was delicious, and the crust was so good(which many places fail at).

Even though I'm rarely out in this area due to the distance, I'll surely be back to try more things on the menu!

Glad to have met you! And glad to have finally tried the pizza! üòÅüçï

Thanks Mike!

BTW.. The pic of the two slices on the tray, are on a normal extra large pizza tray. The slices are really that big!

Locally owed Pizzeria, with hard working ownership. Mikol and his team make some great food, wow! The pizza was fresh, cheese was edge-to edge and the large was enough to feed the family.  The 1lb wings were cooked to perfection and tasted amazing.  The calzone was the best I‚Äôve ever had. It comes with 3 topping of your once.   The Buffalo quesadillas smelled and tasted delicious.  They support your local public  servants (police, firefighters and EMT). If you‚Äôre looking for delicious pizza spot,  this is it.
Biggest and most authentic NY style pizza I've had yet in Ohio!  Ordered 2 different pizza, antipasto salad and tried the chocolate cup cookie cakes- everything was so good! New favorite!

recentReviews.text: Very friendly people pizza was huge !!! Hands down top fav new place to eat and it‚Äôs super affordable as well I couldn‚Äôt even finish one piece it was so big !
Pizza was great! If your in the area I definitely recommend checking it out. Keep up the great work üòÅ!
Spikes never disappoints! The NY style is a family favorite.  Huge, hot & cheesyüòã
Stopped there today and ordered a medium deluxe, and it was excellent! The Owner was a nice guy, and it was a very friendly atmosphere. We will definitely be back
Tried Uncle Spike for the first time, pizza was very good, will support local business instead of going out of town. Enjoyed brief chat with owner. Ordered take-out.

Best pizza in Northeast Ohio. The large calzone is enormous and delicious. So cheesy. So meaty. So good!

Update 6/20/25
Got 4 full sheet pizzas. Excellent service, excellent pizza. Spikes is simply the best.

Great pizza !!! I got the New Yorker, it was huge and the guy was nice and gave me a discount for ordering 2 of them, I didn't even ask for it either. If you are in the area highly suggest getting it and next time I'm round there I will be trying their other styles of pizza
Hands down the best pizza üçï üòã in Aurora IMHO ... YUMMMMM

detailedReviews.text: Tried Uncle Spike for the first time, pizza was very good, will support local business instead of going out of town. Enjoyed brief chat with owner. Ordered take-out.

detailedReviews.text:
Best pizza in Northeast Ohio. The large calzone is enormous and delicious. So cheesy. So meaty. So good!

Update 6/20/25
Got 4 full sheet pizzas. Excellent service, excellent pizza. Spikes is simply the best.

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Black
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza !!! I got the New Yorker, it was huge and the guy was nice and gave me a discount for ordering 2 of them, I didn't even ask for it either. If you are in the area highly suggest getting it and next time I'm round there I will be trying their other styles of pizza

detailedReviews.text: Hands down the best pizza üçï üòã in Aurora IMHO ... YUMMMMM

detailedReviews.author: UPREWT
detailedReviews.text: I love this place. The New Yorker is HUGE and it‚Äôs always so good. Last week I went to pick up my pizza and because it was so big I went to put it through my door sideways into the car and the pizza fell out of the box on the ground. The guy at the register immediately told them to make me a new one and helped me clean it up. When I went to pay for the new pizza they said ‚Äúno worries‚Ä¶ accidents happen, enjoy your pizza‚Äù and didn‚Äôt let me pay for the new one. Super nice people and definitely did make my night!

detailedReviews.author: Anil Bouri
detailedReviews.text: Awesome pizza, great service and staff, what a good find!!!

detailedReviews.author: Desiree Warren
detailedReviews.text: 10/10. It‚Äôs a small pizzeria so you can‚Äôt dine in but when I tell you me and my son sat in the parking lot and ate the entire pizza! It was so delicious and cheesy. Will be back next time I visit Aurora

detailedReviews.author: Kris F
detailedReviews.text: Biggest and most authentic NY style pizza I've had yet in Ohio!  Ordered 2 different pizza, antipasto salad and tried the chocolate cup cookie cakes- everything was so good! New favorite!

detailedReviews.author: Frederick Harmon
detailedReviews.text: Mike is a nice guy (I could set and talk all day) and pizza is delicious.  Can't wait to visit again !

detailedReviews.author: Donnie Hankins
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was good except they did not get the order correct, missing all my meat toppings. Carry out only

detailedReviews.author: Everett Ayers
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was awesome and the coustomer service was awesome

detailedReviews.author: KC & Happy Days
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza & true love of business & pride of product comes from the owner of this pizza shop. He shared with me a little more about his business & his taste for great food. The sauce is delicious & we will be sure to ask for a little extra on our next pizza order because we loved it so. The sub & brownie were tasty as well. Next time, a specialty pizza is up for order.

detailedReviews.author: Google User
detailedReviews.text:
"Mike is fantastic! He always delivers my food with a warm smile, making the experience even more enjoyable. His friendly demeanor truly brightens my day!"

Nina

detailedReviews.author: Harry Bernstein
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza. Great service

detailedReviews.author: Sierra Shores
detailedReviews.text: Delicious local pizza. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. This is our go-to pizza place in Aurora!

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Fisher (Brandon Fisher)
detailedReviews.text:
Didn‚Äôt even try it once I got it home. First visit and didn‚Äôt know what to expect. Saw all the cheese (not a huge cheese fan) and toppings under it (I hate that).

Staff was AWESOME! Super kind and quick, price seemed reasonable also.

Well my wife tried it and said it tasted ok but very cheesy.

Wish this business the best but it‚Äôs not for us.

detailedReviews.author: TJ E
detailedReviews.text: Very cheesy and the pizza was huge!

detailedReviews.author: Brian Murphy
detailedReviews.text: Ordered the large cheese and it is huge and delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Moon
detailedReviews.text: Really great food and you won't meet a better person. Makes you feel at home and they show a lot of appreciation for there customers. Very respectful place and I'll definitely continue my pizza nights from Uncle Spikes!

detailedReviews.author: Kaitlyn Skowronski
detailedReviews.text:
the pizza is SO GOOD
the cheesy bread SO GOOD
phenomenal pizza and service, we will come back if we‚Äôre ever in the area again.

detailedReviews.author: Justin J
detailedReviews.text:
So glad to have discovered this place! Mind you, I discovered it through installing the epoxy floors there, because I actually live an hour away. But I stopped there today and finally had a chance to try out his pizza..

And let me tell you! Some of the best pizza I've ever had! I got the New Yorker, and I've legitimately never seen a bigger pizza, not in person at least.

I've gotten to know the owner, and he seems to really care about his business, and clearly cares about his pizza, because it for sure shows in the quality of it! All of the ingredients tasted super fresh, and super tasty.

I got the New Yorker with Pepperoni and Banana Peppers, my personal favorite combination. And I only made it through 2 slices!! 2!!

This pizza is worth every dime. It was not only tasty, but cooked to perfection. The toppings were plentiful, the dough was delicious, and the crust was so good(which many places fail at).

Even though I'm rarely out in this area due to the distance, I'll surely be back to try more things on the menu!

Glad to have met you! And glad to have finally tried the pizza! üòÅüçï

Thanks Mike!

BTW.. The pic of the two slices on the tray, are on a normal extra large pizza tray. The slices are really that big!

detailedReviews.author: JB
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza around! Veteran friendly

detailedReviews.author: Brendan Hyland
detailedReviews.text: This place is great.  Food has always been great here.  Wings and pizza were perfect again tonight.  Employees are awesome!!

detailedReviews.author: Mike K
detailedReviews.text: The pizza, calzone, and parmigiana bread is outstanding at Spikes. The owner, Mike, is a great guy. Love chatting pizza with him when I pick up. They have an old school operation and execute it perfect each time.

detailedReviews.author: Don Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Myers J Holler Jr
detailedReviews.text: Their pizza is great. I've tried a few different ones. My favorite is the chicken bacon ranch pizza. Don't forget the wings or chicken quesadillas.

detailedReviews.author: Tim Kucharski
detailedReviews.text: Love the pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Todd Kalal
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely amazing experience.  The spinach and artichoke pizza is amazing. The 4 meat pizza.....aaaaamazing. prompt delivery

detailedReviews.author: Haley Mesko
detailedReviews.text: Try the garlic parmesan wings THEY ARE SO GOOD and the pizza is great!

detailedReviews.author: Italian Urns
detailedReviews.text: It was a delicious cheese pizza & the service was friendly - thank you

detailedReviews.author: Saidrasul Saidkarimov
detailedReviews.text: Our favorite local and fresh pizza

detailedReviews.author: H.S. Crow
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in north ohio

detailedReviews.author: Angelica Gonzalez
detailedReviews.text: Great place! Great service!

detailedReviews.author: Lawrence Stevens
detailedReviews.text: My first time ordering. Very pleasant experience and conversation with the owner and one of his employees. The food was great (deluxe pizza and wings).  My wife and I have been attempting to find a good pizza spot that‚Äôs not a chain and I think that Uncle Spike‚Äôs is just the pizzeria for us!

detailedReviews.author: Terry Frost
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around!

detailedReviews.author: Philip Evans
detailedReviews.text: The only regret we have is how long we waited before coming in to see Mikol and his AMAZING team.  The food is amazing, and probably the best pizza I've had in a really long time.  We ordered a calzone also, and it just really blew us away how great it tasted!  The portion is amazing, the food is great, and it was served with a smile....boy, you certainly know when you are getting good customer service, and this is it....it's our new, favorite pizzeria!  Thanks SO much, Mikol, I appreciate what you do - keep up the good work...and cranking out the best pizzas in Aurora!

detailedReviews.author: Darlene Duffy Armillotti
detailedReviews.text: This has to be the best pizza I have ever tasted. You get your monies worth.

detailedReviews.author: Sam Hemoud
detailedReviews.text: Locally owed Pizzeria, with hard working ownership. Mikol and his team make some great food, wow! The pizza was fresh, cheese was edge-to edge and the large was enough to feed the family.  The 1lb wings were cooked to perfection and tasted amazing.  The calzone was the best I‚Äôve ever had. It comes with 3 topping of your once.   The Buffalo quesadillas smelled and tasted delicious.  They support your local public  servants (police, firefighters and EMT). If you‚Äôre looking for delicious pizza spot,  this is it.

detailedReviews.author: C McW
detailedReviews.text:
This is the best pizza I‚Äôve had in many years.
I ordered a double cheese pizza.  No toppings because that‚Äôs how I try new places.  Some places when you order extra cheese then when you get it you wonder if they remembered to put on extra cheese or if you‚Äôve been had.
There was no question that my Uncle Spike‚Äôs pizza had extra cheese.  Thick and delicious!  The dough was fresh and delicious and for me it was just the right thickness.  Not too thick and not too thin.
The sauce I believe is an Uncle Spike‚Äôs original.  It‚Äôs tangy with just a tiny bit of sweetness.  Perfect

I ordered the 14‚Äù pie which will leave a little left for breakfast tomorrow üòä

They make pizzas as large as 24‚Äù!  I saw the boxes!  How fun to order those for a party!  I saw a 20‚Äù they were sliding out of the oven and man did it look delicious!

This isn‚Äôt a chain pizzeria.  Expect to pay more because you‚Äôre getting quality.  And when you lift the pizza box it has heft - you know you‚Äôre paying for a great pizza experience!

detailedReviews.author: Benjamin Franz
detailedReviews.text: Coming from someone who eats a lot of pizza, this place is fantastic!!!! Ordered my pizza well done, came perfectly cooked‚Ä¶piping hot‚Ä¶ and the way the sauce cooked onto the crispy crust‚Ä¶. Good lord. Please give this place a shot and see for yourself. Highly recommended!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Larry H
detailedReviews.text:
Was excited to try the deep dish. It was a big disappointment. Very soupy and sloppy. It‚Äôs an expensive pizza to be that disappointing.

Wings were so-so but the mild buffalo wings tasted more like a dry rub than a buffalo sauce. Garlic parmesan wings were slightly better.  They also forgot the two orders of blue cheese that I paid for.

On the plus side, the delivery was on time and pretty fast from time of order to time of delivery.

detailedReviews.author: A B
detailedReviews.text: Deep Dish 5+ pound monster pie...Chicago style has nothing on this pie...30 minutes outside of Cleveland & worth the drive to get one

detailedReviews.author: Nick E.
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was just ok. Decent, but no crisp ‚Ä¶even the crust was a bit spongy. Delivery took 1.5 hours.

detailedReviews.author: Lorri Winfrey
detailedReviews.text: Great calzones.

detailedReviews.author: Chris C.
detailedReviews.text: First time eating here. Tasty pizza! Quite cheesy. I'd like more sauce to balance out the cheese, but that's just my preference. The owner is very cordial and knows his craft. You can tell he takes pride in his business.

detailedReviews.author: Dan Koltiska
detailedReviews.text: Love the chicken quesadilla.  Excellent pizza options.  Great non chain place.  Better than anything else around.

detailedReviews.author: Herb Kaiser
detailedReviews.text: Really good pizza, best in the area.

detailedReviews.author: Mollie Bippus
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful pizza! They are huge, but the left overs aren't going to last long. ;)

detailedReviews.author: Gina Birch
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great service! Mike, the owner, is a real gem. üíú

detailedReviews.author: Rex Poe
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Aurora! We've had Gioninos and Lee Angelo's numerous times, but we decided to try Uncle Spike's tonight.  It's the best pizza in Aurora hands down.

detailedReviews.author: Violet Spagnolo
detailedReviews.text: Bought a pizza for the first time at Uncle Spikes today.  It was amazing to say the least.  The young man at the register was so welcoming and friendly.  He ran around counter to open the doors for me.  Service and food was definitely outstanding!!!  I highly recommend ordering from here because you're sure to return!!!

detailedReviews.author: Tyler F
detailedReviews.text: Amazing Calzone and first time there! Moving to the area soon and this will be my spot to go!

detailedReviews.author: Kris
detailedReviews.text: Love how they put the pepperoni under the cheese

detailedReviews.author: Pamela Nerby
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza.  Ordered a deep dish trying the establishment for the first time. There is no disappointment. Great customer service. The order was ready fast for a deep dish. Price point is great. The pie was filled with zesty pepperoni along with our other choices. Great tasting pizza pie. I will definitely be ordering more and trying out thier New Yorker next. Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Gale
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza in Aurora!

detailedReviews.author: David Arnold
detailedReviews.text: Just the best calzone I've ever had!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Kevin LaRoche
detailedReviews.text: Always ready before they say

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Alarcon-Avila
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: Kevin T
detailedReviews.text: Ordered deep dish because of the high rating it got compared to East of Chicago, & UNO. Big mistake. Wasnt bad, wasnt good either. Stick with the NY style, cant go wrong. Deep dish was a soupy mess...

detailedReviews.author: Jim Lupica
detailedReviews.text:
The New York style pizza is HUUUUUGE. They cut it in 8 pieces.
We ordered pepperoni and sausage on it. The pepp was big and the sausage was like meatballs. Both meats were very tasty.
The pizza had a delicious chewy crust. I really enjoyed eating this pizza...for the first couple of minutes, then it became a challenge. I was the only one to finish the entire piece.
My suggestion when eating it...cut the piece in halves or thirds. Then your stomach won't explode.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Morascyzk
detailedReviews.text: The Pizza is top notch! My son and I shared a small and it was perfect for 2. All ingredients were very fresh and tasty. Staff inside was welcoming and friendly! I will come back when in the area.

detailedReviews.author: Ray Killian
detailedReviews.text: Their pizza is the biggest pizza around.  Their large is like a round sheet pizza.   I would rate them in my top 5 in the area.  They are much better  than the chain stores.  Reasonable price.

detailedReviews.author: The Webtoon Man
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in area. New yorker pops

detailedReviews.author: Kyla
detailedReviews.text: We are visiting out of state and decided to try this place because it's down the road OMG they are massive and the best pizza we have had!

detailedReviews.author: Mike Wolff
detailedReviews.text:
Great pizza
Great calzones

detailedReviews.author: Sara Amato
detailedReviews.text: We got this one time and fell in love. It‚Äôs our new favorite. Their pizzas are HUGEEEE and all the ingredients are delicious. We also love their calzones! Definitely recommend!!

detailedReviews.author: iam.tripplej
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs says online that they are open on Thursday at 11 and I called multiple times after 11 on Thursday and no answer. Some of my calls got sent to voicemail and in the voicemail it says the hours which for Thursday they open at 11. Called again finally got answer and the guy was giving me a tone and said they weren‚Äôt open and then hung up on me.

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Serafine
detailedReviews.text: Pizza the size of my head? I think yes. This place was phenomenal. Also, try the sausage it hits different.

detailedReviews.author: Christopher Prochaska
detailedReviews.text:
Amazing food, huge portions on the large pizza.
No more delivery available but worth the drive.

detailedReviews.author: craig sprouse
detailedReviews.text: Really good food

detailedReviews.author: Carl Logsdon
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was delicious and the wings were  also delicious

detailedReviews.author: michael stefano
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza and not to mention the best wings in the area aurora's best pizza and wing stop !

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Alexander
detailedReviews.text: OMG...THIS PIZZA IS SOOOOOO FREAKING GOOD AND THE PRICE IS EVEN BETTER

detailedReviews.author: Krissie Lyden
detailedReviews.text: This pizza was amazing. We ordered the New Yorker with banana peppers, onions and mushrooms. The picture doesn‚Äôt do it justice, it was 24‚Äù long!  The cheese was nicely browned and the dough fully cooked. Perfect.

detailedReviews.author: Mia A
detailedReviews.text: My favorite pizza on this side of town! Get the New Yorker. Plan ahead and call early, they get busy!

detailedReviews.author: Vanessa Gliha
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza. Be sure to plan time-wise when ordering. Pizza takes 1-2 hours at minimum to be ready (both pickup and delivery). They turn their phones off and switch to the answering service that states their hours anywhere between 30-45 minutes before their stated closing time. It's great that they're so high in demand but it's a huge inconvenience if you don't plan ahead.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the enormous size and delicious taste of the New Yorker pizza, making it a standout favorite. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and accommodating staff, including the owner Mike, consistently enhance the dining experience with exceptional customer service. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The authentic NY style pizza is highly praised for its taste and quality, making it a top choice for locals. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Incorrect orders and missing items (e.g., missing meat toppings, forgotten blue cheese) - review management can address this concern
Long delivery times (e.g., 1.5-hour delivery) - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Confusion about business hours and poor customer service response - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
